In this post, I will clean a really messy dataset using the ´tidyverse´

```{r}
ggplot(mpg) +
 aes(x = displ, y = hwy, colour = class) +
 geom_point(size = 1L) +
 scale_color_hue() +
 theme_minimal()
```
